name: Shop Checklist
description: Making sure you have enough Mana Orbs.

disable-checkmark.name: No Checkmark
disable-checkmark.description: Icons aren't greyed out and displayed without checkmark. If you want to see the designs.

no-garage-button.name: Not in Garage
no-garage-button.description: Removes the button from the Garage, so you can only see it in the Shops.
